document_data.caption: A map showing the Central Plains in central Callidyrr.
document_data.name: Central Plains (Alaron)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Central Plains''' was an open plain located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Central Plains covered much of the open land within the county of [[Talffolk]] in central Callidyrr. They were bordered in the west by the [[Dernall Forest]], and in the east by the coast with the [[Sea of Swords]] and [[Torriage Wood]]. The [[Swanmay River]] formed the plains' southern edge while the cut of land formed by [[Whitefish Bay]] formed the northern edge. The Central Plains covered roughly {{SI|360|sq mi|k|long=yes}} of land in Callidyrr.
